title: Asia's longest and highest Ski Drag Lift
description: Ski Drag Lift at Kongdori, Gulmarg executed by JKCCC and shall be put to commercial operation during the winter season 2025-26

title: Water body conservation initiative at Kongdori
description: The Restoration and Beautification of the historic Seven Springs water body at Kongdori using scientific methods. Executed by JKCCC / RDD

title: World's highest Revolving Restaurant / Multipurpose Hall
description: The multipurpose hall at Apharwat (G4) with an intake capacity of 70 Persons, situated at an altitude of 4390 meters (14,403 feet) above sea level.

title: Winter Sports Festival 2025
description: Annual winter sports festival featuring skiing, snowboarding, and ice skating competitions. Registration open for all age groups.

title: Kashmir Heritage Walk Series
description: Guided heritage walks covering Mughal gardens, old city markets, and historic monuments. Available daily from 10 AM to 4 PM.

title: Tulip Festival 2025
description: Asia's largest tulip garden showcasing over 1.5 million tulips of 68 varieties in full bloom.
location: Indira Gandhi Memorial Tulip Garden, Srinagar

title: Kashmir Food & Culture Festival
description: Celebrate the rich culinary heritage of Kashmir with traditional Wazwan, street food stalls, and cultural performances.

title: Pahalgam Summer Adventure Camp
description: Adventure activities including river rafting, trekking, camping, and paragliding for tourists and adventure enthusiasts.
